sentences.en: A microchip is embedded in the center paper of the new generation of passports.
sentences.cn: 新一代护照的中心页嵌入了一枚微型芯片.

sentences.en: Charge and discharge control and circuit protection is implemented by using battery protection IC and microchip.
sentences.cn: 本文利用专用集成芯片和单片机实现了充放电控制和电路保护功能.

sentences.en: Diversified technology companies are microchip technology with biology to begin applying genomics data to drug discovery.
sentences.cn: 初创的腾隆生物科技公司正在开发用于药物研究和疾病诊断的微型“芯片实验室”系统.

sentences.en: Engineer at the Advanced Computing Systems Division of IBM commenting on the microchip.
sentences.cn: 在IBM的高阶计算系统区分设计评论微集成电路.

sentences.en: Examples of serial communication Chipscreen procedures. Microchip MCU for novice not familiar with the great help.
sentences.cn: 微芯串行通信范例程序. 对于微芯MCU不熟悉的新手帮助很大.

sentences.en: Integrated circuit ( IC ): or microcircuit , or chip, or microchip.
sentences.cn: 集成电路: 亦称微电路 、 芯片或微芯.
日本最大的芯片生产商

sentences.en: My dog has a microchip embedded behind his ear.
sentences.cn: 我的狗的耳后植入了一枚微型芯片.

sentences.en: Small , we claim , is beautiful ( especially in the age of the microchip ).
sentences.cn: 我们好说以 小为贵 ( 尤其在这集成电路时代 ).

sentences.en: The average microchip is about the size of a grain of rice.
sentences.cn: 一般的微型芯片像大米颗粒大小.

sentences.en: The electrical signal generator and the battery of the microchip are connected in series.
sentences.cn: 微型芯片的电信号发生器和电池串联连接.

sentences.en: The microchip laser is specifically designed for those applications requiring high water absorption.
sentences.cn: 该微片激光器是专门设计用于那些高要求防水性的产品.

sentences.en: The microchip system is changing that.
sentences.cn: 现在的微型芯片正在改变这种情况.

sentences.en: The scanner emits a low frequency radio signal, activating the microchip.
sentences.cn: 扫描仪会发出一些低周波的无线电信号, 来激活微芯片.

sentences.en: This microchip is placed between the shoulder blades.
sentences.cn: 这种芯片置于肩膀刀片.

sentences.en: While the price for microchip implantation can vary, it often falls between $ 25 and $ 40.
sentences.cn: 微芯片植入的价格不等, 常在25和40美元之间.

words.tran_cn: 微电脑；[计] 微型计算机

trans.tran_cn: 微晶片，微型集成电路片
trans.tran_en: a very small piece of  silicon  containing a set of electronic parts, which is used in computers and other machines

trans.tran_cn: 植微芯片于（动物皮下，作识别用途）
